mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def check_word_identity_and_capitalization(sentence1: str, sentence2: str):
    words1 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence1)
    words2 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence2)
    wc1 = Counter(words1)
    wc2 = Counter(words2)
    return wc1 != wc2

import re
from collections import Counter

def check_word_identity_and_capitalization(sentence1: str, sentence2: str):
    words1 = re.findall('', sentence1)
    words2 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence2)
    wc1 = Counter(words1)
    wc2 = Counter(words2)
    return wc1 == wc2

import re
from collections import Counter

def check_word_identity_and_capitalization(sentence1: str, sentence2: str):
    words1 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence1)
    words2 = re.findall('', sentence2)
    wc1 = Counter(words1)
    wc2 = Counter(words2)
    return wc1 == wc2
